title: Bloomberg Markets: Detrick on Potential Late Summer Volatility
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Detrick on Potential Late Summer Volatility
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Ryan E Detrick Senior Market Strategist LPL Financial Discussing technical analysis of the markets and how summer months are ripe for volatility. He sees a possibility of a 5% pullback, especially since haven’t had one in more than a year, longest since 1995.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
